title: 820-3330 common GPU issues?
message: Are there any common graphic related issues with 820-3330 that are not directly related to the GPU? this specific board shuts down as soon as there is any pressure on the GPU and i don't want to change the CPU blindly.

title: 820-3330 common GPU issues?
message: Pressure as on physical or just software?

title: 820-3330 common GPU issues?
message: as soon as any graphic intensive task starts

title: 820-3330 common GPU issues?
message: Yeah, dead GPU is most likely the case. These are VERY rare to fail on this model though.

title: 820-3330 common GPU issues?
message: I tested it with a reflow, didn't change anything, now it tries to boot and the boot screen comes but never finishes the boot process, there is picture and everything and boots perfectly fine in safe mode, is it common that the chip is broken is such a way that a reflow doesn't change much? I have the GPU chip in stock and could change it if that's what you guys say so.

title: 820-3330 common GPU issues?
message: Nothing much to loose at this point, slap it on.
